normal_hint: Coolant at proper level in radiator/expansion tank; no need to top up.
abnormal_hint: Coolant below recommended level or requires frequent topping up.

normal_hint: Hoses intact with no cracks or bulges; clamps tight; no seepage.
abnormal_hint: Cracked, soft, or bulging hoses; loose clamps; signs of coolant seepage or leaks.

inspection_item: Inspect radiator for dirt and debris
normal_hint: Radiator fins clear; no significant dust, dirt, or debris blocking airflow.
abnormal_hint: Radiator fins coated with dirt, dust, or debris; airflow visibly restricted.

normal_hint: Coolant appears clean with correct concentration per manufacturer guidance.
abnormal_hint: Discolored coolant, visible rust/scale, or unknown/incorrect mix.

inspection_item: Inspect water pump area for leaks
normal_hint: No coolant dripping or stains around water pump area.
abnormal_hint: Coolant traces, wetness, or dried residue around water pump or weep holes.

inspection_item: Confirm engine reaches normal operating temperature
normal_hint: Engine reaches stable operating temperature within normal range during test run.
abnormal_hint: Overheating, temperature fluctuating, or engine running colder/hotter than normal.

normal_hint: Fan belt free of cracks and fraying; surface not glazed.
abnormal_hint: Cracks, fraying, glazing, or missing belt segments.

normal_hint: Belt deflection within manufacturer spec; no slipping noise.
abnormal_hint: Belt too loose (slips/squeals) or overly tight (excessive strain on pulleys).

normal_hint: Cap seals correctly; no signs of damage; holds pressure.
abnormal_hint: Damaged or missing cap; evidence of coolant escape around cap.

normal_hint: Cap fits securely; no corrosion or deformation at neck.
abnormal_hint: Damaged cap, corrosion at neck, or evidence of coolant leaks around cap.

normal_hint: Fuel level within acceptable range for standby operation.
abnormal_hint: Fuel level low for expected runtime or below site policy threshold.

normal_hint: Fuel lines intact; no cracks, bulges, or damp spots; fittings tight.
abnormal_hint: Visible fuel leaks, dampness, cracks, or loose fittings.

normal_hint: Filter housing dry, no leaks; service date within recommended interval.
abnormal_hint: Leaks at filter, heavily corroded housing, or overdue replacement.

inspection_item: Drain water/sediment from fuel tank or separator
normal_hint: No significant water or debris in drained sample; fuel appears clean.
abnormal_hint: Water, sludge, or visible contamination in drained sample.

normal_hint: Hoses flexible, not hardened or cracked; no chafing or rubbing points.
abnormal_hint: Hard, brittle, cracked hoses or signs of chafing against other components.

inspection_item: Check fuel tank vent and breather
normal_hint: Vent unobstructed; no dirt, insects, or debris blocking breather.
abnormal_hint: Blocked or restricted vent; buildup of debris around breather.

normal_hint: Valves operate smoothly; no leakage around seals.
abnormal_hint: Valves seized, hard to operate, or leaking at stem or body.

normal_hint: Day tank level normal; no leaks; gauges operational.
abnormal_hint: Leaks around day tank, faulty level gauge, or abnormal level trends.

normal_hint: Lugs and terminals tight; no discoloration, arcing marks, or insulation damage.
abnormal_hint: Loose connections, burned/discolored insulation, or evidence of arcing.

inspection_item: Inspect control panel indicators and gauges
normal_hint: All indicator lights and gauges operate as expected; no active alarms.
abnormal_hint: Warning lights illuminated, gauges reading out of normal range, or inoperative indicators.

inspection_item: Check generator breaker position and condition
normal_hint: Breaker in correct standby position; mechanism operates smoothly; no visible damage.
abnormal_hint: Breaker difficult to operate, signs of overheating, or incorrect position for standby.

normal_hint: Harnesses secured; insulation intact; no chafing or rubbing points.
abnormal_hint: Frayed insulation, loose harness supports, or wires rubbing on sharp edges.

inspection_item: Test engine start and run under no-load
normal_hint: Engine starts promptly and runs smoothly without abnormal noise or vibration.
abnormal_hint: Hard starting, rough running, or abnormal noises during operation.

normal_hint: Alternator housing undamaged; mounting bolts secure; no oil or coolant contamination.
abnormal_hint: Cracks, loose mounting hardware, or signs of fluid contamination on alternator.

normal_hint: Block heater warms engine as expected; cords and connections intact.
abnormal_hint: Block heater not functioning, damaged power cord, or loose connection.

normal_hint: Terminals clean and tight; no corrosion; cables secure with no broken strands.
abnormal_hint: Corrosion on terminals, loose clamps, or damaged battery cables.

normal_hint: Electrolyte level within marked range; plates fully covered.
abnormal_hint: Low electrolyte exposing plates or uneven levels between cells.

normal_hint: Voltage within normal range for fully charged battery (e.g., ~12.6V for 12V).
abnormal_hint: Voltage significantly below normal fully charged range.

normal_hint: Battery maintains voltage under load within acceptable drop limits.
abnormal_hint: Voltage drops excessively during load test; battery fails to hold charge.

normal_hint: Battery case intact; no swelling or cracks; hold-down hardware secure.
abnormal_hint: Cracked or swollen case, loose hold-downs, or signs of impact damage.

normal_hint: Charging indicator normal; voltage within specified charging range.
abnormal_hint: Charger not operating, overcharging, or undercharging battery.

normal_hint: Filter free of heavy dirt buildup; restriction indicator in normal range.
abnormal_hint: Filter heavily dirty, clogged, or restriction indicator showing high restriction.

inspection_item: Inspect air filter housing and seals
normal_hint: Housing intact; seals/gaskets in place; no gaps for unfiltered air.
abnormal_hint: Cracked housing, missing seals, or evidence of dust bypassing filter.

inspection_item: Inspect air intake piping and clamps
normal_hint: Piping secure; clamps tight; no cracks or loose joints.
abnormal_hint: Loose clamps, cracked piping, or signs of rubbing and wear.

normal_hint: Inlet clean; no foreign objects; no excessive oil residue.
abnormal_hint: Foreign material at inlet, heavy dust buildup, or excessive oil film.

inspection_item: Check for obstructions at air intake louvers
normal_hint: Louvers free of debris; airflow path unobstructed.
abnormal_hint: Leaves, dust, or debris blocking louvers or screens.

normal_hint: Breather element clean; no blockage; hoses intact.
abnormal_hint: Blocked or heavily contaminated breather, damaged breather hoses.

inspection_item: Inspect intercooler or aftercooler core (if equipped)
normal_hint: Core fins clean; no significant dirt or oil film; airflow unobstructed.
abnormal_hint: Fins clogged with dirt/oil; visible damage or bent fins restricting airflow.

inspection_item: Inspect fuel pump and injection lines
normal_hint: Pump body dry; injection lines tight; no signs of leakage or chafing.
abnormal_hint: Fuel seepage at pump or lines; chafing marks; damp connections.

inspection_item: Verify emergency stop and safety shutdown circuits
normal_hint: Emergency stop and safety shutdowns function correctly during test.
abnormal_hint: Emergency stop or safety shutdowns fail to operate or behave erratically.
